Itemized Passive Description:
*Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another
"Final Trump Card" or "Super Bosses" Category ally on the
team upon the character's entry*
- {passiveImg:once}Ki +3, ATK & DEF 130%{passiveImg:up_g} and foresees enemy's Super
Attack for 3 turns
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +3
- ATK & DEF 130%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (STR
excluded) to STR Ki Spheres
*When HP is 30% or more*
- Ki +3
- Damage reduction rate 30%{passiveImg:up_g}
*3 or more STR Ki Spheres obtained*
- Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of
becoming a Super Attack
*5 or more STR Ki Spheres obtained*
- Launches an additional Super Attack
*As the 1st attacker in a turn*
- ATK & DEF 130%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Damage reduction rate 30%{passiveImg:up_g}
*As the 2nd or 3rd attacker in a turn*
- High chance of launching an additional Super Attack
- Attacks are effective against all Types
- ATK & DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g} when attacking with 12 or more Ki

Active Skill.Effect Description:
Causes ultimate damage to enemy; 
Ki +24 and ATK & DEF +30% for 1 turn
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when there is a 
"Tournament Participants" Category enemy 
starting from the 3rd turn from the character's 
entry turn, or starting from the 5th turn 
from the character's entry turn (once only)
